description:
Wordpress is a widely known platform which can also be utilized for building membership sites.

This course covers a walk through of setting up and using the ZippyCourses membership plugin for Wordpress.

Why take this course?

If you ever considered building your own membership site, this is the perfect course for you to explore the ZippyCourses plugin and get a full understanding of it's functionality.

I take the time to:

  • Walk you through setting up ZippyCourses.
  • Show you why ZippyCourses is a good choice for Wordpress membership sites.
  • Show you how to create units, lessons, configure pricing, email marketing & more.
  • Show you how to setup a sales page for your ZippyCourses membership site
  • Discuss principles of "mini courses" and how you can use these to validate your course ideas.

I even walk you through my own ZippyCourses membership site!

it's a great way to get an understanding if this plugin is right for your course.

I've also included an entire section on marketing ideas you can use to market your course once it's complete.
title: How To Create a Wordpress Membership Site With ZippyCourses
